DataElement.preferredName: Patient Antineoplastic Agent Therapeutic Procedure For First Protocol Definition Relapse Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response to a question that asks whether or not the patient received any form of anti-cancer therapy subsequent to a first relapse as defined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Antineoplastic Agent Therapeutic Procedure For First Protocol Definition Relapse
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A substance that inhibits the maturation, growth or spread of tumor cells._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The reason of something._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A rule which guides how an activity should be performed._A concise explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase or symbol._The return of a disease after a period of remission.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Antineoplastic Agent Therapeutic Procedure For First Protocol Definition Recurrent Disease
Property.preferredDefinition: A substance that inhibits the maturation, growth or spread of tumor cells.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The reason of something.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:A concise explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase or symbol.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Concepts.definition: A substance that inhibits the maturation, growth or spread of tumor cells.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A concise explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase or symbol.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: dates on which therapy was administered or other therapy-related events occurred.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 11/17/21 changed WS from Retired Deleted to Retired Archived and added end date. Workflow status set to "Retired Deleted" in 3.0 deployment, was previously Deleted using the Admin Tool "Delete" function key. This function is no longer available.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable
